Now, Hol Horse, stick your fingers up Polnareff's nose, and then...
Everyone is bleeding and out cold!
This is your chance to kill them all!
So, when the hell is this chance coming?
What am I supposed to do now?
What the hell are you doing, Hol Horse?
I would like to know myself!
Th-The other three are coming this way!
How am I supposed to make it like the prediction from here?
Polnareff, did you find the guy following us?
Avdol and the others are c-coming.
Hey, can you hear me, Polnareff?
Was someone following us, after all?
What was this about me getting
this lucky chance to beat them
if I stuck my fingers up Polnareff's nose?!
This situation is the exact opposite!
Episode 37 Hol Horse and Mondatta, Part 2
If Avdol were to find me now, I would be killed!
If I would known this was going to happen, I would have
just used my gun in the first place.
If nothing else, my gun was faster than Polnareff's sword just now.
Hurry up and get them to leave!
If they do find me, I can at least kill you, Polnareff.
By the way, what are you doing in that corner?
Tell them you were about to take a piss.
I needed to take a piss.
Seriously, you were taking a piss?
That is an embarrassing thing to do in the middle of a city.
Damn bastard, jabbing that gun into my head...
I will send them a signal.
Look where my tongue is pointing!
It is a sign for you to look behind me!
Why are they being so quiet?
A-Anyway, that is what is up.
You guys can go on ahead.
Why are you making that face?
No, I think he is saying something is behind
There is someone under that box, too!
Sticking my fingers up his nose made him sneeze!
I could have at least killed Polnareff.
I should have never teamed up with you, Mondatta!
I am going to be killed!
I failed thanks to your prediction, damn it!
That one guy is over there.
He is the bastard who blew my ear off outta nowhere at the airport.
It was so sudden, even they could not get their Stands
out in time to avoid the truck...
I stuck my fingers up his nose, and the prediction came true.
All four of them at once...
But it is too early to finish them off.
We must see what the next prediction says, yes.
The chance to kill them has arrived!
We should hide and see how things go.
It is still too soon to get close to them.
The other three have passed out, but Jotaro's still awake.
So Jotaro dodged the truck just a second before.
If I had carelessly closed in, he would have countered.
He must be wondering why I disappeared without finishing them off.
You want to beat them, do not you, Mondatta?
After all we have been through,
we have got to win, no matter what.
We are just one step away from victory.
So Mondatta, what do we have to do to finish them off?
I will do whatever they tell me to.
If it is sticking my fingers up something, I will do it.
If I have to eat shit, I will do it in a heartbeat.
Now, Hol Horse's next attack will be the climax!
Hol Horse found some guys working on sewage pipes.
He paid them so they would open up a section of the pipes.
If Hol Horse fires all of his bullets into that pipe at noon sharp...
Hey, looks like there was a car accident around the corner.
Let us hurry up and finish this job.
Hold this pipe for a sec.
Wh-What is going to happen if I fire into that pipe?
Hurry up and turn the page!
What is going to happen when I shoot my bullets into that pipe?
The bullets will come shooting out of the pipe.
Hol Horse's bullets shot through his brain!
Right smack in the middle of his forehead!
I was waiting for this, yes.
I was waiting for this prediction, yes.
I-It is amazing, but hang on!
We will be in trouble if we interpret it wrong.
L-Look at this page from earlier.
This is the prediction that appeared before your brother got blown up.
This is what happened to your brother!
Th-That is because my brother had the ability to transform,
But y-you and I cannot transform, yes.
I will not even attempt to act like Jotaro.
I will be able to avenge my brother, yes.
There is no mistake in this prediction, yes.
If you shoot your bullets into this pipe, Jotaro will die, yes.
There is only two minutes left until noon!
Y-You just have to shoot into the pipe, yes.
You have plenty of time, yes.
Since there is a specific time...
Take a section of this pipe off.
Hey, who do you think you are talking to?
Who the hell do you think you are?
M-Mr. Hol Horse, ordinary people cannot see your Stand, yes.
And the comics say to pay them, yes.
I only have a minute and ten seconds left!
I will pay you, so open it!
You will pay us just for opening it?
I do not have any money!
I forgot it at the hotel.
I gave you a coin purse just in case you got lost, did not I?
There is only forty seconds left.
Hey, I saw one fly over there into the shadows.
It is just change, but there is quite a bit.
Hey, you are stepping on one.
Everyone, it is coming up noon.
so why do not you take a lunch break?
I said to hurry up and open it!
Or I will split your heads open with this rock!
I shot into it at noon sharp, just like in the prediction!
Someone get this damn block off of me.
Jotaro's face is right in front of the pipe!
I do not know what the hell Hol Horse was thinking,
but he stuck his fingers right up my nose.
Wh-What the hell is going on?!
My premonitions have never ever been wrong, yes!
Jotaro and the others are alive.
None of my bullets hit them!
It is totally different from the prediction!
And now for the news at noon...
Wh-Which means I shot my bullets before noon.
What the hell is going to happen?
What is going to happen next?!
According to this prediction, the bullets
I shot were supposed to hit Jotaro dead-on.
What the hell is going to happen next?!
Hey, I heard screaming around that corner.
I do not know what is going on, but it is not good.
After what happened with the truck,
it will make trouble for us if the cops show up.
Let us get out of here.
What the hell happened to Hol Horse, anyway?
Hey, it is dangerous to hang around that pipe, Jotaro.
I have no idea what happened, though.
It looks like a bullet went through his forehead and out the top of his head.
One centimeter down, and he would have been dead.
And... this was Hol Horse's fate.
My brother and Hol Horse lost against fate.
The only one who could face someone so lucky is Lord Dio.
I am starting to think revenge is really stupid.
Let us just forget about Jotaro and his friends.
If we use my Stand's predictions not for attacking others,
but for our happiness and to help people in trouble...
and I bet more good luck would come our way.
I am sick of spending my life cowering under a box, afraid of everyone.
This fight has forced me to grow.
To Aswan, to where you are.
I did not mean to hit you.
I have seen it before, but where?
Hey, by the way, where did that dumbass dog go?
I am sure he is eating something off the street somewhere.
I told you that he would be useless.
If it were that easy to change your personality and grow as a person,
Mondatta became even more depressed than before,
and was admitted to the hospital with Hol Horse.
I was looking for you because I have a request.
By the way, where did Iggy go?
I cannot let a kid who likes dogs die.
The Guardian of Hell, Pet Shop, Part 1
